commit message: v0.3.3: added a random maze generator, currently used in the tengu boss fight
v0.3.3: fixed item windows going offscreen in landscape
v0.3.3: icon png optimization
v0.3.3: tweaked the default text size for wndOptions
v0.3.3: no subclass is now named 'none' instead of null
v0.3.3: tweaked how items auto-pickup
v0.3.3: fixed a bug with ethereal chains and enemy visibility
v0.3.3: removed exception eating in herosubclass
v0.3.3: fixed a bug with Tengu's blink ability
v0.3.3: added some safety checks to cursed wands spawning plants
v0.3.3: fixed guards using their chains while paralyzed
v0.3.3: added char properties, starting with IMMOVABLE implementation
v0.3.3: implemented BOSS and MINIBOSS properties
v0.3.3: fixed a typo in thief
v0.3.3: implemented the UNDEAD property
v0.3.3: changed EVIL propery to DEMONIC, implemented it
v0.3.3: fixed bugs with rot heard and lashers
v0.3.3: updated copyright on maze painter
v0.3.3: adjusted wndOptions to be wider in landscape
v0.3.3: added the ability to highlight text in WndOptions
v0.3.3: added the ability to flip the screen in landscape/portrait
v0.3.3: undid warrior beard changes from 1.9.1 source
v0.3.3: manifest commit

v0.3.3: removed google play games references from welcomescene

Sorry open source folk, the source is going to remain as independent as possible, so no dependencies on external platform stuff!
v0.3.3a: added some safety checks to GameLog
v0.3.3a: fixed wand of prismatic light not prolonging light buff
v0.3.3a: throw is now the default action for ceremonial candles
v0.3.3a: fixed a nullpointer in disintegration traps
v0.3.3a: fixed a crash involving tengu's jump
v0.3.3a: bugfixes and safety checks to tengu and ranged attacks
v0.3.3a: added a little holiday treat ;)
v0.3.3a: added new teasers
v0.3.3a: fixed an incorrect sprite offset value for newborn elementals
v0.3.3a: fixed newborn elementals spawning inside the hero
v0.3.3a: tweaked rings to use super.name() instead of name
v0.3.3a: made weapons use name() instead of name
v0.3.3a: adjusted how mage's staff handles its name
v0.3.3a: 'visible enemies' rule no longer applies to container heaps
v0.3.3a: improved sandals of nature's use of name
v0.3.3a: tweaked fleeing to behave a bit more consistently with an invisible enemy
v0.3.3a: thieves now actually get away, rather than just destroying an item.
v0.3.3a: manifest commit
v0.3.3b: fixed crashes with sandals of nature
v0.3.3b: fixed crashes with mobs fleeing, further tweaked thief behaviour
v0.3.3b: fixed a rare concurrent modification exception in rogue armor
v0.3.3b: manifest commit
